title: White Sands National Monument: Holiday Open House
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Ranger Programs     Community Events     Holiday Open House                  Holiday Open House         NPS Photo  The White Sands National Monument Holiday Open House is a yearly celebration of community collaboration to recognize the support of our gateway communities in our success throughout the year. The holiday open house is a delightful way to get into the festive spirit and a fantastic way to celebrate the season with friends and family. Live music, ranger programs, children's activities, and the more than 300 luminarias that decorate the historic 1936 adobe visitor center make this a memorable experience. When Typically the first Friday of December. Reservations Reservations are not required or permitted. Where The visitor center courtyard.In case of inclement weather, the program may be moved into the visitor center. This is an indoor and outdoor event; please dress appropriately for the weather. Cost Program is free. Monument entrance fees apply if you wish to drive further into the monument past the fee station. Program length Several programs are offered that vary in length. The entire holiday open house event is typically scheduled from 5 p.m. until 7:30 p.m. Accessibility The visitor center and the courtyard are wheelchair and stroller accessible. Service animals are allowed at all monument facilities open to the general public. Restrooms Public restrooms are available outside the visitor center area. Seating Seating is available in the courtyard. Pets Pets are not allowed in the visitor center or the courtyard.
